content:
I'm looking at the Cerner documentation for building a SoF LaunchString, i notice that it doesn't escape the special characters in the iss parameter ... should this be escaped?

LaunchURL: https://<gh-username>.github.io/smart-on-fhir-tutorial/example-smart-app/launch-patient.html?iss=https://fhir-myrecord.sandboxcerner.com/dstu2/0b8a0111-e8e6-4c26-a91c-5069cbc6b1ca

Documentation Page: https://engineering.cerner.com/smart-on-fhir-tutorial/#launch-a-standalone-app

Screenshot: https://www.screencast.com/t/iFQoYt5c
